mapper.select: SELECT purpose_kind_name, bld_nm, grd_name, w_one_energy_require, crtif_isu_dd, loc_addr, zeb, mm_thous_p, mm_ten_thous_p, mm_fifty_thous_p, del_yn FROM solar_p_energy_rank

SELECT purpose_kind_name, bld_nm, grd_name, w_one_energy_require, crtif_isu_dd, loc_addr, zeb, mm_thous_p, mm_ten_thous_p, mm_fifty_thous_p, del_yn FROM solar_p_energy_rank WHERE 1=1 AND purpose_kind_name = #{purposeKindName} AND bld_nm = #{bldNm}
